text: The Women's 50m backstroke event at the 2010 South American Games was held on March 28, with the heats at 10:08 and the Final at 18:00. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Fabíola Molina '''' |Jeserik Andreina Pinto '''' |Carolina Henao '''' |} ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=75% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2010 South American Games |- |World record | |27.06 |Rome, Italy |30 July 2009 |- |Competition Record | |30.14 |Buenos Aires, Argentina |17 November 2006 |- |South American record | |27.70 |Rome, Italy |29 July 2009 |} ==Results== ===Heats=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%" style="width:35em;" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
